body.raw:
{
    "orderId": "{{OrderId}}",
    "transactionId": "{{TransactionId}}",
    "transactionDate": "{{currentTime}}",
    "storeId": "{{storeId}}",
    "shippingAmount": 10,
    "taxAmount": 10,
    "transactionAmount": 100, // transactionAmount = salesAmount + shippingAmount
    "loyaltyLineItems": [
        {
            "lineItemId": "{{lineItemId}}",
            "globalProductId": "150100-045",
            "retailAmount": 100.0, 
            "salesAmount": 90.0, // SaleAmount = RetailAmount - discountAmount
            "unitAmount": 90.0,
            "discountAmount": 20.0,
            "taxAmount": 10,
            "quantity": 1,
            "lineItemType": "Purchase"
        }
    ],
    "tenders": [
        {
            "paymentType": "Cash",
            "tenderAmount": 100 // tenderAmount = transactionAmount
        }
    ]
}
